text: What is the purpose of the VisualTreeAsset in UI Toolkit?

options.text: To hold visual styles for UI elements
To apply visual effects to UI elements

feedbackCorrect: A VisualTreeAsset in UI Toolkit represents a UI hierarchy, which you can design in the UI Builder.
feedbackIncorrect: A VisualTreeAsset in UI Toolkit represents a UI hierarchy, which you can design in the UI Builder.
